SELECT bi.id, bi.title, bi.content, bi.date, tu.USERNAME AS userName FROM bulletin_info bi LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON (tu.USER_ID = bi.publisher) WHERE 1 = 1
AND bi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bulletinInfo.title},'%')
AND bi.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bulletinInfo.content},'%')
ORDER BY bi.date DESC
